src/gfs-print-info.c File Reference

Detailed Description

This interface deals with the printing of useful information.

Definition in file gfs-print-info.c.

void print_author ( FILE *  stream,
cint  exit_code 
)

A function that prints author information.

This function prints to the output `stream' the author information of the program. After that, it exits with `exit_code'.

Parameters:
stream a pointer to a `FILE' data structure.
exit_code a constant integer value.
